description: BC26 Development Hooks - Copy to ~/.cursor/hooks.json to activate

afterFileEdit.description: Auto-format AL code and run LinterCop after edits

beforeReadFile.description: Block reading of sensitive files and build artifacts

afterAgentResponse.description: Log AI usage for team analytics

notes.installation: Copy this file to ~/.cursor/hooks.json (or %USERPROFILE%\.cursor\hooks.json on Windows)
notes.priority: User home directory has highest priority, then global config
notes.testing: Test hooks with: echo 'test' | pwsh -File script.ps1
